definition: Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
darkness comes before dawn/things can only get better (idiom)
pinyin: li2 ming2 qian2 de5 hei1 an4

sentences.english: Some glorious morn--but when? Ah, who shall say?
sentences.chinese: 光荣的黎明，谁能说何时出现？

sentences.english: Before dawn, the wife went downstairs to prepare the family feast.
sentences.chinese: 在黎明前，妻子下楼去准备家里的酒席。

sentences.english: They managed to escape just before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 就在黎明之前，他们设法逃了出来。

sentences.english: The dawns on the top of that mountain are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 长夜躺在你的路边，黎明在朦胧的山后睡眠。

sentences.english: This must be the dawn of wizard hipsters.
sentences.chinese: 这一定是巫师嬉皮士的黎明。

sentences.english: He stood up and drew the curtains to let in the pale glint of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 他起身拉开窗帘，让黎明的翕光射进房间。

sentences.english: She told Ming, they have ushered in the dawn.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉明台，他们已经迎来了黎明。

sentences.english: After a long day the range you relax by watching "Red Dawn".
sentences.chinese: 行军一整天后，你看《赤色黎明》来放松。

sentences.english: And move me to my marriage-morn.
sentences.chinese: 直把我带到婚姻的黎明。

sentences.english: Tian Liming was born in Beijing in May 1955.
sentences.chinese: 田黎明1955年5月出生于北京，安徽合肥人。

sentences.english: It began as a deep rumble, shattering the predawn silence.
sentences.chinese: 一声低沉的隆隆声，打破了黎明前的寂静。

sentences.english: The fire was completely overcome by daybreak.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时大火已被完全扑灭。

sentences.english: The darkest hour is that before the dawn.
sentences.chinese: 黎明之前是最黑暗的时刻，否极泰来。

sentences.english: Sun follows day. night, stars, and moon;
sentences.chinese: 日月如梭，星月满天之后必然是黎明。

sentences.english: Dawn at Muri Lagoon, with a view towards Motu Taakoka.
sentences.chinese: 穆里礁湖的黎明和对面塔柯卡岛的景色。

sentences.english: The hound hunted all night. He quit when the roosters started crowing at daybreak.
sentences.chinese: 那只猎犬忙乎了整晚，到黎明公鸡报晓时才休息。

definition: dawn/fig. the dawn of a new era
first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
Jacky Cheung or Hok Yau Jacky (1961-), Cantopop and film star
Alan Tam (1950-), Hong Kong Canto-pop singer and actor
Charlie Young (1974-), Hong Kong actress and singer
darkness comes before dawn/things can only get better (idiom)
pinyin: li2 ming2 qian2 de5 hei1 an4
